issues.title: [ImportVerilog] Crash on ordering-methods-reverse test

recommendation.reason: Related issues exist (#8283, #8332) about string type support in MooreToCore, but none specifically address string type as MODULE PORT causing assertion failure. Issue #8283 is about string variables, #8332 is about string to LLVM lowering. This bug specifically exposes missing port type validation for DynamicStringType.

related_issues.relevance: High - same root cause area (string type not supported in MooreToCore)
related_issues.difference: That issue is about string variables, this is about string PORTS
Feature request for string support, not a crash report
Different trigger (real type conversion, not string port)
